SEARCH
Package managers.csvhandlers

Class PatientManagerCSVHandler

java.lang.Object
managers.csvhandlers.PatientManagerCSVHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
CSVHandler
public class PatientManagerCSVHandler extends Object implements CSVHandler
The PatientManagerCSVHandler class handles the reading and writing of patient data from and to a CSV file. It uses the PatientManager class to store patient records in memory and manages data consistency between the CSV file and memory.
Since:
2024-11-21

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientManagerCSVHandler

      public PatientManagerCSVHandler()

  • Method Details

    • loadCSV

      public static void loadCSV()
      Loads patient data from the CSV file into memory. If the PatientManager.allPatients list is not empty, it is cleared before loading new records. This method skips the header row in the CSV file and reads each subsequent line to create Patient objects, which are added to the PatientManager.allPatients list.

    • writeCSV

      public static void writeCSV()
      Writes all patient data from memory to the CSV file. Existing data in the file will be overwritten. This method first writes a header row and then iterates over the PatientManager.allPatients list to write each patient's data as a line in the file.

    • convertToCSV

      public static String convertToCSV(Patient patient)
      Converts a Patient object to a CSV-formatted string. This method serializes all patient fields, including lists (e.g., past diagnoses and past treatments), using the specified delimiters.
      Parameters:
      patient - the Patient object to be converted.
      Returns:
      a string representing the patient in CSV format.
